# Plan v1 — Blog + Resume Rewrite

- keep `CNAME` untouched so the custom domain still resolves.
- remove the old “宝宝英语乐园” assets and replace with a Jekyll skeleton that delivers:
  - `/` résumé-style homepage using `_layouts/home.html` and `_data` driven cards.
  - `/blog/` list and `_posts` article pages with `blog_index`/`post` layouts and bilingual headings inspired by 博客园.
  - site-wide light/dark theming and language toggles persisted via `localStorage`.
  - SEO helpers `jekyll-feed`/`jekyll-sitemap` plus placeholders for RSS/search/links.
- store the plan content (this file) so any future iteration can append `plan/YYYY-MM-DD-vN.md` entries for traceability.
